title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1619/1999 of 23 July 1999 adapting certain fish quotas for 1999 pursuant Council Regulation (EC) No 847/96 introducing additional conditions for year-to-year management of TACs and quotas
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1619/1999
of 23 July 1999
adapting certain fish quotas for 1999 pursuant Council Regulation (EC) No 847/96 introducing additional conditions for year-to-year management of TACs and quotas
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quotas fixed in Regulations (EC) No 48/1999, (EC) No 51/1999, 53/1999, (EC) No 63/1999 and (EC) No 65/1999 are increased or reduced as shown in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
